cRefPattern.p: This pattern references a specific line.
This pattern references an inscribed surface.
This pattern references a specific artefact, usually a tablet.

div.l: [...] x sag#? il2#? ni2 gur3-ru dumu ki ag2 an gal na-<nam>
[...]-IN#?-<SI>-na {d}uraš-e tu-da ša3-ta nam-gal-še3
[...] gi4#?-gi4 gal-di ⸢a⸣-⸢a⸣ ⸢gu2⸣-na agrig zi e2#?-ub-a
[...]-da šu du7 bara2#? ku3#?-ge4 he2-du7
[nig2]-⸢nam⸣-ma-ni pa e3
{d}nin-arhuš? ga-ša#?-an TA x x IGI SAR-SAR
nam-kur6 diri ka-⸢ge2⸣ dab#?-ba-za
a-ra mah-bi? ša#?-⸢en⸣-x-x-e
a-⸢a⸣ gu2-zu en-na#? ⸢ku3⸣-⸢ga⸣ x
me-ta#? me duru5{+ri} za-ra ma-ra-ra-x-[...]
lipiš šu#?-nigin2 BU? DUB? zi-zi-le-dam#? lu2#? ⸢nu⸣-da#?-ta#? am3 x
{d}lamma{+ma}-zu#? lu2 til-le lu2#? ug5#?-[...] za-⸢ra⸣ mu-ra-an-BU
nin tu9-du11-ga-ni nu-ku5-a zi di zi x nu-šum2#?
gi-ge2-ge5#?-ig šu lu2 DI he2-DI-e ⸢sa2⸣ nu-IG-še-e
Proud ..., bearing an aura, she is indeed(?) the beloved child of great An
Ninisina, given birth to by Uraš, from the womb towards greatness(?)
Exalted advisor of her birth father, true steward of the ... temple
Fitting ..., may it be appropriate for the pure(?) throne(?)
Everything about her is manifest
Nin-arḫuš, lady ...
Your surpassing size, surpassing description
May its supreme way/divine decree be praised(!?)
Your birth father, holy An(?) ...
Cosmic powers ... apart from the other cosmic powers, he ... for you
To ... the entire intestines(?), to ... from the lying man(?)
To rouse and wrap/heap up(?) a man, you brought ... away from the heart/womb/innards/stomach(?)
Your physician's art ... the living man and dead man for you
Lady whose incantation formula cannot be changed/cut (i.e., interrupted?)(?), ...
If boils(!?) ... on the body(?) of a man(?)...
